#										
# Welcome to my simple Mandelbrot Tool el16b005 www.dwell.at			
#										
# This is the setup file with couple of pre-defined coordinates			
# adapt - extend - modify this file according your needs			
# every line which is starting with a # is treated like a comment			
# following values MUST be set, otherwise standard-values
# values with given coordinates, itearations and color mapping are tested					
#
# filename prefix	prefix is used for output, limited to 10 chars
#
# width			in pixel i.e. 640 - 800 - 1024 - 1280 - 1920 - ...		
# height		in pixel i.e. 480 - 600 -  768 - 1024 - 1080 - ...
#
# mode			1   for one fixed zoom pictures
#			xxx for xxx pictures starting zoom from 2		
#
# realoffset		zoom offset real axis						
# imagoffset		zoom offset complex axis
#
# zoomfaktor		only needed if mode = 1, otherwise don't care			
#
# iterations		the more the better quality the more calculation power
#
# map type		1  linear red
#			2  linear green
#			3  linear blue
#			4  PT1 red
#			5  PT1 green
#			6  PT1 blue
#			7  sin red
#			8  sin green
#			9  sin blue
#			10 sin cyan			
#
# RGB offset value	to influence color behaviour
#			15  good value vor sin
#			100 good value for PT1
#										
# I added some interesting zoom coordinates, just copy them and keep the syntax	
#										
# start of configuration
#
fractal_a
800
600
35
3.557430e-1
6.500264e-1
1
2000
9
50.0
#
# end of configuration
#
# tested coordinates to zoom in, copy and paste to the section above
